00061 class BoundingVolume{
00062 public:
00063 
00064   typedef enum{
00065     NULL_VOLUME_TYPE,
00066     RECTANGULAR_SOLID,
00067     SPHERE
00068   }volume_t;
00069 
00071   BoundingVolume();
00072 
00074   BoundingVolume(const BoundingVolume& src);
00075 
00076   virtual ~BoundingVolume();
00077 
00078   void remove_nonsurface_points(chain_const_iter _begin,
00079                                 chain_const_iter _end);
00080 
00082   my_float_t
00083   dist_to_nearest_grid_pt(const my_float_t* given_pt, const my_float_t tol)
00084   {
00085     const my_float_t squared_tol = tol*tol;
00086     my_float_t min_dist_2 = my_float_max;
00087     for(const my_float_t* pt = grid_pts_beg; pt < grid_pts_end; pt += 3){
00088       my_float_t tmp = dist_squared(given_pt, pt);
00089       min_dist_2 = (min_dist_2 > tmp ? tmp : min_dist_2);
00090       if(min_dist_2 <= squared_tol) break;
00091     } 
00092     return std::sqrt(min_dist_2);
00093   }
00094 
00096   virtual bool contains(const my_float_t *point) const = 0;
00097 
00098   virtual bool BIND_vol_contains(const my_float_t *p) const = 0;
00099 
00100   virtual bool RAD_vol_contains(const my_float_t *p) const = 0;
00101    
00103   virtual size_t discretize(const my_float_t spacing, 
00104                           my_float_t **grid_pts) = 0;
00105 
00106   const my_float_t* grid_points_begin() const { return grid_pts_beg; }
00107 
00108   const my_float_t* grid_points_end() const { return grid_pts_end; }
00109 
00110   void clear();
00111 
00112   static const my_float_t MIN_VDW_DIST;
00113 
00114   virtual std::string xml_str() = 0;
00115 
00116 protected:
00117   void copy_points(my_float_t *points, size_t n, size_t stride);
00118 
00119   void set_grid_points(my_float_t* grid_pts, const size_t npts);
00120 
00121   static const my_float_t MAXRADDIST;
00122   static const my_float_t MAXBINDDIST;
00123   static const std::string _fname; 
00124 private:
00125   my_float_t* grid_pts_beg;
00126   my_float_t* grid_pts_end;
00127 
00128   static const my_float_t MAX_HYDRO_DIST;
00129 };

00132 class RectangularSolid : public BoundingVolume{
00133 public:
00134   RectangularSolid(const my_float_t *min_corner_in,
00135                    const my_float_t *max_corner_in,
00136                    const my_float_t grid_spacing = 0.0);
00137 
00138   RectangularSolid(const RectangularSolid& src);
00139 
00140   ~RectangularSolid() {;}
00141 
00142   virtual bool
00143   contains(const my_float_t *point) const
00144   {
00145     for(size_t i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00146       if(point[i] < min_corner[i] || point[i] > max_corner[i]) return false;
00147     return true;
00148   }
00149 
00150   virtual bool
00151   BIND_vol_contains(const my_float_t *p) const
00152   {
00153     for(size_t i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00154       if(p[i] < BIND_min_corner[i] || p[i] > BIND_max_corner[i]) return false;
00155     ++p;
00156     return true;
00157   }
00158 
00159   virtual bool
00160   RAD_vol_contains(const my_float_t *p) const
00161   {
00162     for(size_t i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00163       if(p[i] < RAD_min_corner[i] || p[i] > RAD_max_corner[i]) return false;
00164     return true;
00165   }
00166 
00167   virtual size_t discretize(const my_float_t spacing, my_float_t **grid_pts);
00168 
00169   virtual std::string xml_str();
00170 
00171 private:
00172 
00173   my_float_t min_corner[3];
00174   my_float_t max_corner[3];
00175   my_float_t BIND_min_corner[3];
00176   my_float_t BIND_max_corner[3];
00177   my_float_t RAD_min_corner[3];
00178   my_float_t RAD_max_corner[3];
00179 };

00182 class Ball : public BoundingVolume{
00183 public:
00184   Ball(const my_float_t *center_in, const my_float_t radius_in,
00185        const my_float_t grid_spacing = 0.0);
00186 
00187   Ball(const Ball& src);
00188 
00189   ~Ball() {;}
00190 
00191 //  void
00192 //  add_tolerance(my_float_t tol_change = 0.0)
00193 //  { radius += tol_change; }
00194 
00195   virtual bool
00196   contains(const my_float_t *point) const
00197   { return dist_squared(point, center) <= rad_squared; }
00198 
00199   virtual bool
00200   BIND_vol_contains(const my_float_t *point) const
00201   { return dist_squared(point, center) <= BIND_rad_squared; }
00202 
00203   virtual bool
00204   RAD_vol_contains(const my_float_t *point) const
00205   { return dist_squared(point, center) <= RAD_rad_squared; }
00206 
00207   virtual size_t discretize(const my_float_t spacing, my_float_t **grid_pts);
00208 
00209   virtual std::string xml_str();
00210 private:
00211 
00212   my_float_t center[3];
00213   my_float_t radius;
00214   my_float_t rad_squared;
00215   my_float_t BIND_rad_squared;
00216   my_float_t RAD_rad_squared;
00217 };

00220 class UnionOfBalls : public BoundingVolume{
00221 public:
00222   UnionOfBalls(const size_t num_balls, const my_float_t *centers, 
00223                const my_float_t *radii);
00224 
00225   UnionOfBalls(const CoordFile &mol, const my_float_t tol = 3.0);
00226 
00227   UnionOfBalls(const UnionOfBalls& src);
00228 
00229   virtual ~UnionOfBalls()
00230   { clear(); }
00231 
00232   virtual bool
00233   contains(const my_float_t *point) const
00234   {
00235     bool rv = false;
00236     const my_float_t *center = A_centers_begin;
00237     const my_float_t *rad_squared = A_radii_squared;
00238     for( ; center < A_centers_end; center += 3, ++rad_squared) 
00239       if(dist_squared(point, center) <= *rad_squared){
00240         rv = true;
00241         break;
00242       }
00243     return rv;
00244   }
00245 
00246   virtual bool
00247   BIND_vol_contains(const my_float_t *point) const
00248   { 
00249     bool rv = false;
00250     const my_float_t *center = A_centers_begin;
00251     for( ; center < A_centers_end; center += 3)
00252       if(dist_squared(point, center) <= A_BIND_rad_squared){
00253         rv = true;
00254         break;
00255       }
00256     return rv;
00257   }
00258     
00259   virtual bool
00260   RAD_vol_contains(const my_float_t *point) const
00261   {
00262     bool rv = false;
00263     const my_float_t *center = A_centers_begin;
00264     for( ; center < A_centers_end; center += 3)
00265       if(dist_squared(point, center) <= A_RAD_rad_squared){
00266         rv = true;
00267         break;
00268       }
00269     return rv;
00270   }
00271 
00272   virtual size_t discretize(const my_float_t spacing, my_float_t **grid_pts)
00273   { std::cerr << "Unimplemented function!!!!\n"; return 0; }
00274 
00275   virtual std::string xml_str();
00276 private:
00277   void init();
00278   
00279   void clear();
00280 
00281   my_float_t *A_centers_begin;
00282   my_float_t *A_centers_end;
00283   my_float_t *A_radii_squared;
00284   my_float_t A_BIND_rad_squared;
00285   my_float_t A_RAD_rad_squared;
00286 };
